about_the_game:
"This Demo lets you produce and trade with the limited version of Farming & Supermarket Simulator. Complete your fun Farming & Supermarket experience by adding the full game to your wishlist!"

Grow, Harvest, Use

Make the best use of your harvested products: either fill the supermarket shelves or use them as feed for your animals. The choice is yours!


Feed and Collect

Feed your animals and reap the rewards! Feed your chicken a tomato, collect fresh eggs, and enjoy the fruits of your labor.

Invest in Machines

Expand your production by purchasing machines! Process your harvested goods to produce valuable items for your supermarket.

Cashier

Quickly scan items, accept payments in cash or credit, and ensure your customers leave happy with their shopping experience!


Work Smart

Quickly move your product crates to the market, fill the shelves, and meet your customers' demands!

Offer the products you collect to customers in your supermarket. Build a loyal customer base by increasing customer satisfaction. Grow your supermarket by making strategic plans and attract more customers by offering the best service.

Make the best use of your harvested products: either fill the supermarket shelves or use them as feed for your animals. The choice is yours!

name: Farming & Supermarket Simulator Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10
  • Processor: i5 7600K / Ryzen 5 2600x
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10
  • Processor: i5 7600K / Ryzen 5 2600x
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Embark on a relaxing yet challenging journey to manage your own supermarket. Grow organic crops, care for your animals, and sell products to your customers. Build and expand your shelves. Can you transform your supermarket into an empire?
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Turkish, Ukrainian
